If you spend so many hours by yourself shooting,...
...a lot of stuff goes through your mind.
If it's you trying to incorporate everyone on the field in some way,...
...whether you're trying to deceive half of them...

...it makes the game a lot more fun.

Get the passion and the appreciation...
